annotation: Pollex 06: Fariu. :Turn v.i. (Clk) se tourner, faire volte face (Rivierre).

annotation: Pollex 06: Magau. :To turn in one direction, to make a curve to one direction.
turn towards (e.g. turn one's face to the sun
irregular *o > a; note I've taken this to be a transitive form with -si suffix
turn; irregular *o > u; I've taken this to be a transitive form with the -si suffix, cf Kwaio
to turn from side to side, not go straight (of canoe)
1. To turn; swerve; curve (as of a jeep, boat, tricycle)
2. To turn (an vehicle around in the opposite direction); to turn a vehicle
5. To turn ( a vehcile or boat in order to change direction); to steer
6. To turn to the left or right
turn a corner travelling on road
turn a corner travelling on road
To turn over something, turn around, turn a corner, turn away  (as from sin), repent (Ebt)
face, turn or proceed (in a direction). Has directional suffix
face or proceed (in a certain direction)
to turn around (either with head or full body)
to turn or go back again
to turn or go back again
to turn from side to side
